alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 11:28PM EDT until August 12 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1128 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Raybon to Hickox to near Race Pond, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Raybon, Fort Mudge, Atkinson, and Winokur. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
